attributes.action: Get Teresa May out as PM & Get some1 who represents BREXIT & will get out the EU
attributes.background:
Teresa may has a back ground of defying the publc and BREXIT.

She is no good to run the UK and does not have the best interests of the uk at heart.

Share and Sign...

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament, and the leadership of the Conservative party is an internal matter for that party itself.
